entry.title: Forking personal "vanity" versions...
entry.summary: The context is a one-off email from Alan Grimes that is being criticized by another person. In the email, Grimes responds to people who think there are too many vanity versions of bitcoin with the phrase "nuff said." The person criticizing the email finds it useless and unhelpful, and suggests that this kind of content should be kept to oneself in order to avoid cluttering up forums.
